meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>wash</kanji> something to <kanji>cleanse</kanji> it by doing the <vocabulary>washing</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>cleaning</vocabulary>. You have to do the washing if you really want to get all the dirt out and make your things clean.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
